name: Lying Dungeon 2
description:
(I would recommend you play the first game before playing this.)

You are lost in a dungeon deep below the earth, you have no idea how you got there. All you have is you sword, and a mysterious person who keeps telling you to give up.

It is finally finished! It took so long to make this, I'm so glad It's finished. Thanks to everyone who play the first or is playing this one.

WASD/Arrow keys to move, W or up to jump, and later in the game space to swing your sword.
